_meanings:
{@--5@} Initiation, 
communication of an initiatory Mantra
or formula; {#caMdrasUryagrahe tIrTe sidDakzetre#}
{#SivAlaye . maMtramAtraprakaTanamupadeSaH sa ucyate ..#}.

{@--6@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) A form in
a rule, an indicatory form; any
word or part of a word, such as an
affix, augment &c. with its  
{%anubandhas%} which show what 

particular grammatical rules are to be
applied.

<ab>N.</ab> of a philosophical work by
Śaṅkarācārya.
